demo_mode.text: Subscribe to start tracking your own products and see how they perform!

tutorial.welcome: This is your personal Panopti dashboard where you can track and manage bol.com products.
tutorial.step2: Here, you can view all the products you're tracking. The table shows sales, revenue, and reviews over the selected date range. Click on a product to see the details!
tutorial.step3: The date range selection is done here! You can choose any period to inspect the revenue for that period.
tutorial.step4: Revenue is aggregated by day. When you start tracking a new product, it will take a few days before you see meaningful data. âŒ› Please keep this in mind.
tutorial.step5: All you need is its bol.com product URL as pictured, and a fun name of your choosing! ðŸ¤©
tutorial.step6: This list shows all the products you're tracking. You can click on a product to change its name or delete it.
tutorial.step7: Open this menu to add new products to track. All you'll need is its bol.com product page URL and a fun name of your choosing! ðŸ¤©
